alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 5:00PM CDT until July 09 at 5:30PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Morgan County in north central Alabama... Southeastern Lawrence County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 530 PM CDT. * At 500 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Trinity, or 8 miles west of Decatur, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Decatur, Hartselle, Priceville, Trinity, Hillsboro, Chalybeate Springs, Speake, Neel, Caddo and Basham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
